languages.text: {n}Проктор не в силах отвести от вас взгляд, точно мужчину загипнотизировали.{/n} "Разрази меня Лекс! Даже принимая во внимание Патент и все то, чего вы единолично добились в Просторе..." {n}Соломон встряхивает головой, не в силах избавиться от оцепенения.{/n} "Будь я проклят, но в каждом вашем слове звучит истина, которую я не могу оспорить... Из всех людей в секторе вы и впрямь имеете право на десятину — и я, проктор Соломон Антар, подтверждаю это".

{n}Solomorne does not take his eyes off you, as if he had been hypnotised.{/n} "May the Lex strike me down! Even allowing for the Warrant and everything that you have single-handedly accomplished in the Expanse..." {n}He shakes his head, unable to break out of his stupor.{/n} "I'll be damned, but your every word rings with truth that I cannot dispute... Of all the people in this sector, you are the only one who can rightfully lay claim to the tithe, and I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, hereby acknowledge this."

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Blick ruht weiter auf dir, als wäre er hypnotisiert.{/n} "Das Lex soll mich holen! Selbst wenn man den Handelsbrief bedenkt und alles, was Ihr in der Ausdehnung erreicht habt ..." {n}Er schüttelt den Kopf, unfähig, seine Benommenheit abzustreifen.{/n} "Ich will verdammt sein, aber jedes Eurer Worte birgt eine Wahrheit, die ich nicht bestreiten kann ... Von allen Leuten in diesem Sektor seid Ihr {mf|der|die} Einzige, {mf|der|die} den Zehnt rechtmäßig für sich beanspruchen kann, und ich, Proktor Solomorne Anthar, bestätige das hiermit."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not take his eyes off you, as if he had been hypnotised.{/n} "May the Lex strike me down! Of all the people in this sector, you are the only one who can rightfully lay claim to the tithe, and I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, hereby acknowledge this."

Selbst wenn man den Handelsbrief bedenkt und alles, was Ihr in der Ausdehnung erreicht habt ..." {n}Er schüttelt den Kopf, unfähig, seine Benommenheit abzustreifen.{/n} "Ich will verdammt sein, aber jedes Eurer Worte birgt eine Wahrheit, die ich nicht bestreiten kann ... Von allen Leuten in diesem Sektor seid Ihr {mf|der|die} Einzige, {mf|der|die} den Zehnt rechtmäßig für sich beanspruchen kann, und ich, Proktor Solomorne Anthar, bestätige das hiermit."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne ne vous quitte pas des yeux, comme s'il était hypnotisé.{/n} « Que le Warp m'emporte ! Même en tenant compte de la lettre de marque et de tout ce que vous avez accompli à vous {mf|seul|seule} dans les Étendues... » {n}Il secoue la tête, incapable de surmonter sa stupeur.{/n} « J'ai du mal à l'admettre, mais chacun de vos mots exprime une vérité indéniable... Moi, le proctor Solomorne Anthar, reconnais que de tous les humains de ce secteur, vous êtes {mf|le seul|la seule} à pouvoir vous approprier légitimement la dîme. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not take his eyes off you, as if he had been hypnotised.{/n} "May the Lex strike me down! Even allowing for the Warrant and everything that you have single-handedly accomplished in the Expanse..." {n}He shakes his head, unable to break out of his stupor.{/n} "I'll be damned, but your every word rings with truth that I cannot dispute... Of all the people in this sector, you are the only one who can rightfully lay claim to the tithe, and I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, hereby acknowledge this."

Même en tenant compte de la lettre de marque et de tout ce que vous avez accompli à vous {mf|seul|seule} dans les Étendues... » {n}Il secoue la tête, incapable de surmonter sa stupeur.{/n} « J'ai du mal à l'admettre, mais chacun de vos mots exprime une vérité indéniable... Moi, le proctor Solomorne Anthar, reconnais que de tous les humains de ce secteur, vous êtes {mf|le seul|la seule} à pouvoir vous approprier légitimement la dîme. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙目不转睛地盯着你，仿佛被催眠了一样。{/n}“愿帝国法典惩罚我！就算你真的拥有神圣授状，凭借一己之力，在科罗努斯扩区中实现了如此伟业……”{n}他摇了摇头，无法从恍惚的状态中清醒过来。{/n}“恐怕我难逃惩罚，但你说的每句话都是事实，我无法否认……整个科罗努斯扩区的所有人里，只有你有资格要求得到所有的什一税。我，索罗蒙·安萨监察官，在此承认你的要求。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not take his eyes off you, as if he had been hypnotised.{/n} "May the Lex strike me down! Even allowing for the Warrant and everything that you have single-handedly accomplished in the Expanse..." {n}He shakes his head, unable to break out of his stupor.{/n} "I'll be damned, but your every word rings with truth that I cannot dispute... Of all the people in this sector, you are the only one who can rightfully lay claim to the tithe, and I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, hereby acknowledge this."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙目不转睛地盯着你，仿佛被催眠了一样。{/n}“愿帝国法典惩罚我！就算你真的拥有神圣授状，凭借一己之力，在科罗努斯扩区中实现了如此伟业……”{n}他摇了摇头，无法从恍惚的状态中清醒过来。{/n}“恐怕我难逃惩罚，但你说的每句话都是事实，我无法否认……整个科罗努斯扩区的所有人里，只有你有资格要求得到所有的什一税。我，索罗蒙·安萨监察官，在此承认你的要求。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne no aparta la mirada de ti, como si estuviera hipnotizado.{/n} «¡Que la Lex me parta! Incluso con los derechos que concede la Patente y todo lo que ha conseguido personalmente en la Extensión...». {n}Niega con la cabeza, incapaz de librarse de su estupor.{/n} «Maldita sea, sus palabras están cargadas de una verdad que no puedo rebatir... De todas las personas que habitan este sector, usted es la única que puede hacerse legítimamente con el diezmo, y yo, el Procurador Solomorne Anthar, lo reconozco de forma oficial».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not take his eyes off you, as if he had been hypnotised.{/n} "May the Lex strike me down! Even allowing for the Warrant and everything that you have single-handedly accomplished in the Expanse..." {n}He shakes his head, unable to break out of his stupor.{/n} "I'll be damned, but your every word rings with truth that I cannot dispute... Of all the people in this sector, you are the only one who can rightfully lay claim to the tithe, and I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, hereby acknowledge this."

Incluso con los derechos que concede la Patente y todo lo que ha conseguido personalmente en la Extensión...». {n}Niega con la cabeza, incapaz de librarse de su estupor.{/n} «Maldita sea, sus palabras están cargadas de una verdad que no puedo rebatir... De todas las personas que habitan este sector, usted es la única que puede hacerse legítimamente con el diezmo, y yo, el Procurador Solomorne Anthar, lo reconozco de forma oficial».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはまるで催眠にかかったかのように、目をそらさずにあなたを見つめた。{/n}「法が私を打ち砕きますように！たとえ令状や、あなたが単独でこのエクスパンスで成し遂げたすべてを考慮しても…」{n}彼は頭を振り、ぼんやりとした意識から抜け出せない様子だった。{/n}「忌々しいことですが、あなたの言葉のすべてが否定できない真実の響きを持っています…この星域の誰よりも、あなただけが正当に租税を請求できます。そして私、ソロモーン・アンサール代理人はこれをここに認めます」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not take his eyes off you, as if he had been hypnotised.{/n} "May the Lex strike me down! Even allowing for the Warrant and everything that you have single-handedly accomplished in the Expanse..." {n}He shakes his head, unable to break out of his stupor.{/n} "I'll be damned, but your every word rings with truth that I cannot dispute... Of all the people in this sector, you are the only one who can rightfully lay claim to the tithe, and I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, hereby acknowledge this."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはまるで催眠にかかったかのように、目をそらさずにあなたを見つめた。{/n}「法が私を打ち砕きますように！たとえ令状や、あなたが単独でこのエクスパンスで成し遂げたすべてを考慮しても…」{n}彼は頭を振り、ぼんやりとした意識から抜け出せない様子だった。{/n}「忌々しいことですが、あなたの言葉のすべてが否定できない真実の響きを持っています…この星域の誰よりも、あなただけが正当に租税を請求できます。そして私、ソロモーン・アンサール代理人はこれをここに認めます」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, sanki hipnotize olmuş gibi gözlerini senden ayırmıyor.{/n} "Lex alsın canımı! Ruhsatname'yi ve Enginlik'te bir başınıza başardığınız her şeyi göz önünde bulundursak bile..." {n}Başını yana sallasa da sersemliğinden kurtulamıyor.{/n} "Kahretsin ki ağzınızdan çıkan her bir söz, itiraz edemeyeceğim bir gerçeklikle çınlıyor. Bu sektördeki tüm insanlar arasında aşarı haklı olarak talep edebilecek bir siz varsınız. Ben de Üsteğmen Solomorne olarak bunu onaylıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not take his eyes off you, as if he had been hypnotised.{/n} "May the Lex strike me down! Even allowing for the Warrant and everything that you have single-handedly accomplished in the Expanse..." {n}He shakes his head, unable to break out of his stupor.{/n} "I'll be damned, but your every word rings with truth that I cannot dispute... Of all the people in this sector, you are the only one who can rightfully lay claim to the tithe, and I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, hereby acknowledge this."

Ruhsatname'yi ve Enginlik'te bir başınıza başardığınız her şeyi göz önünde bulundursak bile..." {n}Başını yana sallasa da sersemliğinden kurtulamıyor.{/n} "Kahretsin ki ağzınızdan çıkan her bir söz, itiraz edemeyeceğim bir gerçeklikle çınlıyor. Bu sektördeki tüm insanlar arasında aşarı haklı olarak talep edebilecek bir siz varsınız. Ben de Üsteğmen Solomorne olarak bunu onaylıyorum."
